extendedInfo.description: DC Universe Online Map - Provides two highly detailed maps of Gotham and Metropolis City.Locations marked/identified:-Investigations-Briefings-Collectibles-Random Encounters (Superheroes/Supervillians)Credit: Axah121 (SOE Forum), Sony, and DC ComicsDisclaimer: This app requests permission for internet use solely for requesting ads only.

reviews.title: NEEDS UPDATING
reviews.comment: There are many other maps that would be awesome if you could put on here, alerts, raids and such. There are also new DLC\'s that come with there own Briefings, including the Audio Tour, and Deathstroke\'s Contacts. I\'ve used this and it works great, but it just great in the current condition it could be so much better with the above mentioned things plus bounties, and cc bounties. *Idea* Maybe you could make another app that had the details and locations of all the armor pieces and other such items
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I need this so bad
reviews.comment: What\'s a hero who don\'t know his/her city?!?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great map although would like a map of the watchtower but didn\'t mark it down for not having it. It still is very helpful.
reviews.author: michael kehoe

reviews.title: Great idea.
reviews.comment: Its a very good idea for being able to design your own exo/collectables/briefings/investigations. But the filter isn\'t working properly a nd the map zoom is messin\' up saying it\'s unable to zoom all the way. I have a samsung galaxy s3 so it\'s not the phone. Overall it\'s good. Just s work in progress.
reviews.author: Samuel Cunningham

reviews.title: Get this app!!
reviews.comment: I honestly can say this map is useful to me and my character. It\'s great. Just wish there were more maps for different places.
reviews.author: Amir Lawson

reviews.title: Awsome with some problems
reviews.comment: Needs update formost recent dlc and some brief/inv are inaccuratly numbered or displaced but all in,saved me a LOT of time and stress. I recommend this over dcuo.mmorpg-life. Nice maps and zoom. Would recommend the publisher update with alerts/raids and recent updates.
reviews.author: Yuni Donais

reviews.comment: Add support to show character builds and directions on how to get to different cities and it would be perfect
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs updating
reviews.comment: Appreciate the hard work put into this. A continuous map and other suggestions mentioned would be great. Useful nonetheless  xXIceShotXx/us.ps3/icetank/cr83
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: If only!!
reviews.comment: Its 4 star for me cuz idk if the collections are for villians or heroes.. But overall its a good app :).... Also, u should put the exobite thing or is it the white unknown?

reviews.title: So cool and helpful
reviews.comment: This is so cool and helpful and would be even better if it was bird eye veiw
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Five stars if u add all the instances  ;)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dc universe online
reviews.comment: I would give it a 5 if it had everything updated matter you get a 5 cause you did a fantastic job with this can you plz make another app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dcuo fan must have
reviews.comment: Great app.  Any fan of DCUO must have this. If you want all the styles from collections this will help you immensely. There could be more on it but anyone who plays DCUO will appreciate the time it took to map both cities.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Please make another app that includes a list of armor drops (where that drop or from whom)  that would be the best app ever.  Even the wiki has lacking info on armor drops.  It says what drops but not where!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fan-F@#%ING-tastic
reviews.comment: I love your app, even though it\'s a little hard to read because of my sh*t vision, I think it\'s the best map out there. It\'s just absolutely wonderful.
reviews.author: Daniel Jimenez-Miranda

reviews.title: Legit
reviews.comment: Best thing ever. It would be awesome if the cc rogues had a map or were included, but this thing is fantastic nonetheless!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good job but
reviews.comment: They should update the map to where it shows all the new briefs investigations collections and everything else added to the game
reviews.author: Calvin Robertson

reviews.title: Good yet problematic
reviews.comment: Overall Gotham and metropolis maps are needing higher resolutions. They appear blurry at overview map, but individual sections are perfect.  The tap to open OK individual sections is hit it miss, lacking responsiveness or not working. Once sections are open world maps easily scroll.  A potentionally better option then looking at an online map.  Suggestion: screen capture on tap of location markers.
reviews.author: Jessica Pierce

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: Awesomeness! Thanks I\'m so happy I found this!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Quit complaining about what it doesn\'t have. It has what is says, and is AWESOME. Great job Dev. Thank you for us getting before iPhone.
reviews.author: A Google User
